formatted_address: Lot 32-01, Ground Floor, Laman Niaga Sunway, Persiaran Medini 3, Bandar Sunway, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Mimi Story Shop

reviews.text:
There is a lot going on in this store. The concept is an interactive experience for kids in a cafe-like environment for adults. On the ground level by the cafe, kids can select a snack like cotton-candy, popcorn or waffles to create or cook for themselves. The food comes as a cooking station and brought to the table.

Upstairs is a crafting station filled with pendants, beads and buttons. Kids get to select an item to decorate such as a plastic jewelry box, hair pins, bracelets, or lanyards, and then they get to decorate by choosing a glue color and selecting different beads, buttons and ribbons.

I think this place could be enjoyed by children ranging from 4+. I didn't get a chance to try the food, but would be interested in coming back for my older child to try the cooking station.
All fresh handmade desserts like beancurd, fresh soy milk, hot desserts, cold desserts and many more to explore! Come with free flow snacks.
Can put any phone number to contact, easy customer call for confirmation.
The environment and food are good, you can bring your children to learn cookingüßë‚Äçüç≥

vicinity: Lot 32-01, Ground Floor, Laman Niaga Sunway, Persiaran Medini 3, Bandar Sunway, Iskandar Puteri
